```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
files = list.files()
if("abstract_review_all_papers_EDI.csv"%in% files){
  file.rename("abstract_review_all_papers_EDI.csv", "initial_review_all_papers_EDI.csv")
}
# Install and load devtools
install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)

# Install and load EMLassemblyline
install_github("EDIorg/EMLassemblyline")
library(EMLassemblyline)

# Make the EML for EDI ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

make_eml(path = getwd(),
         dataset.title = "Systematic review and meta-analysis of near-term ecological forecasting literature, including forecast performance data. Search conducted May 2020",
         data.table = c("initial_review_all_papers_EDI.csv", "R2_dataset_for_EDI.csv"),
         data.table.name = c("Dataset 1: Abstract review", "Dataset 3: R2 values"),
         data.table.description = c("Dataset 1: Abstract review", "Dataset 3: R2 values"),
         data.table.quote.character = c('"','"'),
         other.entity = c("Final import and analysis - for EDI.Rmd","R2_analysis_EDI.Rmd"),
         other.entity.name = c("General data analysis","R2 analysis"),
         other.entity.description = c("General data analysis","R2 analysis"),
         temporal.coverage = c("1932-11-01", "2020-05-18"),
         maintenance.description = "complete",
         user.domain = "EDI",
         user.id = "ccarey",
         package.id = "edi.183.1")

view_unit_dictionary()
```
